bin/abtsp.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**********************************************************doxygen*//** @file
00002  * @brief   Asymmetric Bottleneck TSP heuristic.
00003  *
00004  * Runs the Bottleneck TSP heuristic on the given asymmetric input file.  
00005  *
00006  * @author  John LaRusic
00007  * @ingroup bin
00008  ****************************************************************************/
00009 #include "common.h"
00010 #include "lb.h"
00011 #include "tsp.h"
00012 #include "btsp.h"
00013 
00014 /* Global variables */
00015 char *input_file = NULL;
00016 char *xml_file = NULL;
00017 char *tour_file = NULL;
00018 int edge_infinity = -1;
00019 int random_restarts = -1;
00020 int stall_count = -1;
00021 int kicks = -1;
00022 int confirm_sol = ARROW_FALSE;
00023 int supress_ebst = ARROW_FALSE;
00024 int find_short_tour = ARROW_FALSE;
00025 int supress_hash = ARROW_FALSE;
00026 int deep_copy = ARROW_FALSE;
00027 int lower_bound = -1;
00028 int upper_bound = INT_MAX;
00029 int basic_attempts = 1;
00030 
00031 /* Program options */
00032 #define NUM_OPTS 15
00033 arrow_option options[NUM_OPTS] = 
00034 {
00035     {'i', "input", "TSPLIB input file", 
00036         ARROW_OPTION_STRING, &input_file, ARROW_TRUE, ARROW_TRUE},
00037     {'x', "xml", "file to write XML output to",
00038         ARROW_OPTION_STRING, &xml_file, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00039     {'T', "tour", "file to write tour to",
00040         ARROW_OPTION_STRING, &tour_file, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00041 
00042     {'I', "infinity", "value to use as infinity",
00043         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &edge_infinity, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00044     
00045     {'r', "restarts", "number of random restarts",
00046         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &random_restarts, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00047     {'s', "stall-count", "max number of 4-swaps w/o progress",
00048         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &stall_count, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00049     {'k', "kicks", "number of 4-swap kicks",
00050         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &kicks, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00051     {'c', "confirm-solution", "confirm solution with exact solver",
00052         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &confirm_sol, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_FALSE},
00053     {'e', "supress-ebst", "supress binary search",
00054         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &supress_ebst, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_FALSE},
00055     {'S', "find-short-tour", "finds a (relatively) short BTSP tour",
00056         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &find_short_tour, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_FALSE},
00057     {'H', "supress-hash", "do not create hash table",
00058         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &supress_hash, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_FALSE},
00059     {'d', "deep-copy", "stores data in full cost-matrix",
00060         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &deep_copy, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_FALSE},
00061         
00062     {'l', "lower-bound", "initial lower bound",
00063         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &lower_bound, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00064     {'u', "upper-bound", "initial upper bound",
00065         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &upper_bound, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00066     {'a', "basic-attempts", "number of basic attempts",
00067         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &basic_attempts, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE}
00068 };
00069 char *desc = "Asymmetric bottleneck TSP solver";
00070 char *usage = "-i tsplib.tsp [options]";
00071 
00072 /* Main method */
00073 int 
00074 main(int argc, char *argv[])
00075 {   
00076     int ret = EXIT_SUCCESS;
00077     int i, u, v, cost;
00078 
00079     arrow_problem atsp_problem;
00080     arrow_problem problem;
00081     arrow_problem_info info;
00082     arrow_tsp_cc_lk_params lk_params;
00083     arrow_btsp_fun fun_basic;
00084     arrow_btsp_result result;
00085     arrow_btsp_params btsp_params;
00086     
00087     double start_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00088     double end_time;
00089     double bbssp_time = -1.0;
00090     
00091     /* Read program arguments */
00092     if(!arrow_options_parse(NUM_OPTS, options, desc, usage, argc, argv, NULL))
00093         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00094         
00095     /* Try and read the problem file */
00096     if(!arrow_problem_read(input_file, &atsp_problem))
00097         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00098     if(atsp_problem.symmetric)
00099     {
00100         arrow_print_error("Solver only works on symmetric matrices.");
00101         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00102     }
00103     
00104     /* Gather basic info about the problem */
00105     if(!arrow_problem_info_get(&atsp_problem, supress_hash, &info))
00106         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00107     printf("Num costs in problem: %d\n", info.cost_list_length);
00108     printf("Max cost in problem:  %d\n", info.max_cost);
00109     
00110     /* Calculate a value for infinity if necessary */
00111     if(edge_infinity < 0)
00112     {
00113         //edge_infinity = info.max_cost * atsp_problem.size + 1;
00114         edge_infinity = info.max_cost * 2;
00115     }
00116     if(edge_infinity < info.max_cost)
00117     {
00118         arrow_print_error("Infinity value is not large enough\n");
00119         arrow_problem_destruct(&atsp_problem);
00120         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00121     }
00122     printf("Infinity: %d\n", edge_infinity);
00123     
00124     /* Create transformed problem */
00125     if(!arrow_problem_abtsp_to_sbtsp(deep_copy, &atsp_problem, edge_infinity, &problem))
00126     {
00127         arrow_print_error("Could not create symmetric transformation.");
00128         arrow_problem_destruct(&atsp_problem);
00129         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00130     }
00131     
00132     /* Determine if we need to call the BBSSP to find a lower bound */
00133     if(lower_bound < 0)
00134     {
00135         lower_bound = info.min_cost;
00136         // TODO: Insert call to a ABTSP lower bound here
00137     }
00138     if(info.max_cost < upper_bound)
00139     {
00140         upper_bound = info.max_cost;
00141     }
00142     
00143     /* Setup LK parameters structure */
00144     arrow_tsp_cc_lk_params_init(&problem, &lk_params);
00145     if(random_restarts >= 0)    lk_params.random_restarts  = random_restarts;
00146     if(stall_count >= 0)        lk_params.stall_count      = stall_count;
00147     if(kicks >= 0)              lk_params.kicks            = kicks;
00148     lk_params.length_bound = (edge_infinity * -1.0) * atsp_problem.size;
00149         
00150     /* Setup necessary function structures */
00151     if(arrow_btsp_fun_basic_atsp(deep_copy, &fun_basic) != ARROW_SUCCESS)
00152         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00153     #define SOLVE_STEPS 1
00154     arrow_btsp_solve_plan steps[SOLVE_STEPS] = 
00155     {
00156        {
00157            ARROW_TSP_CC_LK,                 /* TSP solver */
00158            (void *)&lk_params,              /* TSP solver parameters */
00159            fun_basic,                       /* fun (cost matrix function) */
00160            basic_attempts                   /* attempts */
00161        }
00162     };
00163     arrow_btsp_solve_plan confirm_plan = 
00164     {
00165        ARROW_TSP_CC_EXACT,
00166        NULL,
00167        fun_basic,
00168        1
00169     };
00170     
00171     /* Setup BTSP parameters structure */
00172     arrow_btsp_params_init(&btsp_params);
00173     btsp_params.confirm_sol         = confirm_sol;
00174     btsp_params.supress_ebst        = supress_ebst;
00175     btsp_params.find_short_tour     = find_short_tour;
00176     btsp_params.lower_bound         = lower_bound;
00177     btsp_params.upper_bound         = upper_bound;
00178     btsp_params.num_steps           = SOLVE_STEPS;
00179     btsp_params.steps               = steps;
00180     btsp_params.confirm_plan        = confirm_plan;
00181     
00182     /* Solve BTSP */
00183     arrow_btsp_result_init(&problem, &result);
00184     if(!arrow_btsp_solve(&problem, &info, &btsp_params, &result))
00185     {
00186         arrow_print_error("Could not solve BTSP on file.\n");
00187         ret = EXIT_FAILURE;
00188         goto CLEANUP;
00189     }
00190     end_time = arrow_util_zeit() - start_time;
00191     
00192     /* Transform solution from symmetric solution to asymmetric solution */
00193     if(result.found_tour)
00194     {
00195         /* result.tour_length += atsp_problem.size * edge_infinity; */
00196         result.tour_length = 0;
00197         
00198         int *actual_tour;
00199         if(!arrow_util_create_int_array(atsp_problem.size, &actual_tour))
00200         {
00201             arrow_print_error("Could not create actual_tour array.\n");
00202             ret = EXIT_FAILURE;
00203             goto CLEANUP;
00204         }
00205         arrow_util_sbtsp_to_abstp_tour(&problem, result.tour, actual_tour);
00206         
00207         /* Sanity check */
00208         for(i = 0; i < atsp_problem.size; i++)
00209         {
00210             u = actual_tour[i];
00211             v = actual_tour[(i + 1) % atsp_problem.size];
00212             cost = atsp_problem.get_cost(&atsp_problem, u, v);
00213             
00214             if(cost > result.obj_value)
00215             {
00216                 arrow_print_error("Found tour is no good! WTF?\n");
00217                 fprintf(stderr, "C[%d,%d] = %d, ", u, v, cost);
00218                 ret = EXIT_FAILURE;
00219                 goto CLEANUP;
00220             }
00221             else if(cost < 0)
00222             {
00223                 arrow_print_error("Negative edge in tour! WTF?\n");
00224                 fprintf(stderr, "C[%d,%d] = %d, ", u, v, cost);
00225                 ret = EXIT_FAILURE;
00226                 goto CLEANUP;
00227             }
00228             
00229             result.tour_length += cost;
00230         }
00231         printf("Tour passes sanity check\n");
00232         
00233         /* Tour output */
00234         if(tour_file != NULL)
00235         {
00236             FILE *tour;
00237             char comment[256];
00238         
00239             if(!(tour = fopen(tour_file, "w")))
00240             {
00241                 arrow_print_error("Could not open tour file for writing");
00242                 ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00243                 goto CLEANUP;
00244             }
00245         
00246             sprintf(comment, "ABTSP Tour; Length %.0f, Max Cost %d.",
00247                 result.tour_length, result.obj_value);
00248         
00249             arrow_util_write_tour(&atsp_problem, comment, actual_tour, tour);
00250         
00251             fclose(tour);
00252         }
00253         
00254         free(actual_tour);
00255     }
00256     
00257     /* Final output */
00258     arrow_btsp_result_print_pretty(&result, stdout);
00259         printf("Initial Lower Bound: %d\n", lower_bound);
00260     if(bbssp_time >= 0.0)
00261         printf("BBSSP Time: %.2f\n", bbssp_time);        
00262     
00263     printf("Total Time: %.2f\n", end_time);
00264     
00265     /* Xml output */
00266     if(xml_file != NULL)
00267     {
00268         FILE *xml;
00269         if(!(xml = fopen(xml_file, "w")))
00270         {
00271             arrow_print_error("Could not open xml file for writing");
00272             ret = EXIT_FAILURE;
00273             goto CLEANUP;
00274         }
00275         
00276         fprintf(xml, "<arrow_btsp problem_file=\"%s\"", input_file);
00277         fprintf(xml, " command_args=\"");
00278         arrow_util_print_program_args(argc, argv, xml);
00279         fprintf(xml, "\">\n");
00280 
00281         arrow_btsp_result_print_xml(&result, xml);
00282         
00283         fprintf(xml, "    <total_time>%.2f</total_time>\n", end_time);
00284         fprintf(xml, "</arrow_btsp>\n");
00285         
00286         fclose(xml);
00287     }
00288     
00289 CLEANUP:
00290     arrow_btsp_result_destruct(&result);
00291     arrow_btsp_fun_destruct(&fun_basic);
00292     arrow_tsp_cc_lk_params_destruct(&lk_params); 
00293     arrow_problem_destruct(&problem); 
00294     arrow_problem_destruct(&atsp_problem);
00295     return ret;
00296 }
